Address.Address1: 800m north from Banco de Costa Rica

Description.Text: Croc's Casino Resort is a lively 5-star property offering picturesque accommodation in Jaco. Highlights include a large casino, an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic beachfront location. Jaco is a small city on the pacific coast of Costa Rica. Located in a remote area, it lies between several mountains and picturesque valleys. Places of interest include Herradura Bay and Playa Hermosa. The hotel is housed in a series of modern buildings with balconies. Facilities include a large casino, an outdoor swimming pool, a spa, fitness centre and nightclub. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Mountain View rooms are approximately 37sqm and decorated in a colourful style with wood furniture, pastel tones and hardwood floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and iPod dock. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. There are several dining venues onsite, offering an array of dishes including Latin American and European cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
